berryproof.midnightconfig.title: Berry Proof Configuration
berryproof.midnightconfig.enableSound: Enable sound when damage is blocked
berryproof.midnightconfig.enableSound.la: Toggle sound when damage is blocked.
berryproof.midnightconfig.enableSound.to: If enabled, a sound will play when berry/cactus damage is blocked.
berryproof.midnightconfig.soundVolume.la: Adjust the volume of the protection sound.
berryproof.midnightconfig.soundVolume.to: Set the volume for the sound played when damage is negated.
berryproof.midnightconfig.logTagMatches: Enable verbose logging for tag matching
Show debug info in the log for tag matches.
If enabled, detailed tag match info will be logged for debugging.
berryproof.midnightconfig.enableProtecte: Enable protection for villagers, golems, and wandering traders
Protect tagged entities from berry bushes, cactus and other (if any) damage sources.
If enabled, villagers, golems, and wandering traders are protected even without leggings.
advancement.berryproof.root.title: Berry Proof
advancement.berryproof.berryproofed.desc: Walk through a sweet berry bush without taking damage.
advancement.berryproof.cactusproofed.des: Walk into a cactus without taking damage.
